acknowledgments.summary: Vladimir Dashchenko from Kaspersky Lab reported this vulnerability to AVEVA.

notes.text: Low skill level to exploit. This vulnerability could allow unauthorized access to the credentials for the ArchestrA Network User Account.. CRITICAL INFRASTRUCTURE SECTORS: Chemical, Critical Manufacturing, Energy, Food and Agriculture, Water and Wastewater. COUNTRIES/AREAS DEPLOYED: Worldwide
notes.title: Summary

references.summary: ICS Advisory ICSA-19-029-03 - Web Version - CSAF Version 2.0

notes.text: Wonderware System Platform uses an ArchestrA network user account for authentication of system processes and inter-node communications. A user with low privileges could make use of an API to obtain the credentials for this account.
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary
